text: The Teide Trophy () is a pre-season football tournament organised in Tenerife (Canary Islands. The matches are played at Estadio de Los Cuartos, a historic stadium located in La Orotava,http://web.eldia.es/2010-07-28/jornada/30-Trofeo-Teide-cesped-natural- Cuartos.htm a city in the north of the island.http://www.rsssf.com/tablest/teide.html It has been played annually in August since 1971, and is one of the most prestigious summer tournaments in Spain.http://www.eldorsal.com/index.php/cd-tenerife/hemerotecacdt/7497-pedro- martin-el-mejor-del-trofeo-teide.html == Titles by year == {| align="center" class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" !
